# serverURL

**Instance Property**

The URL of a DNS-over-HTTPS server.

## Declaration

```swift
var serverURL: URL? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The URL should use the URI template format defined by [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8484], for example `https://dnsserver.example.net/dns-query`.

## Configuring server properties

- **init(servers:)**: Initialize the `NEDNSSetting` object.
- **matchDomains**: A list of domain strings used to determine which DNS queries will use the DNS resolver settings contained in this object.

items.description: A list of domain strings used to determine which DNS queries will use the DNS resolver settings contained in this object.
